title: 'Shenmue' Fans Can Rejoice As Ryo Hazuki Joins 'Project X Zone 2'
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Ryo Hazuki, the protagonist from the classic Shenmue games, will be joining the roster of playable characters in the upcoming 3DS crossover ...
